channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 国防部称黑客从台湾最大的电信公司窃取了包括军事和政府文件在内的 "敏感信息"，并在暗网上出售
item.description:
Hackers stole "sensitive information" including military and government documents from Taiwan's largest telecom company and sold it on the dark web, defence ministry sayshttps://t.co/XGcglUX3wB pic.twitter.com/X9DWLWnTI1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 梅-布里特-科德（May-Britt Koed）说："我甚至不知道自己是什么时候出生的，"她是自 20 世纪 50 年代以来被送往国外收养的 25 万名韩国婴儿之一：
item.description:
"I don't even know when I was born," says May-Britt Koed, one of the quarter of a million South Korean babies sent abroad for adoption since the 1950s.

Victims of Denmark's adoption scandal demand answers: https://t.co/rtMGS6951d pic.twitter.com/FFlTbs68Kj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的葬礼将于周五在莫斯科举行，送葬者将冒着被捕的危险前往吊唁。
item.description:
The funeral of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny is to be held in Moscow Friday, with mourners risking arrest to pay their respects.

Navalny's spokeswoman says funeral directors had received threatening calls warning them not to transport his bodyhttps://t.co/5tLLOvJJu1 pic.twitter.com/ew9EHkEi6B

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 根据《柳叶刀》医学杂志发布的研究报告，目前全球有超过 10 亿人患有肥胖症。
item.description:
More than one billion people around the world are now suffering from obesity, study says.

The number has more than quadrupled since 1990, according to the study released by the Lancet medical journalhttps://t.co/wOKTf9JQN3 pic.twitter.com/YLhbr1MSZ4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 日本棒球巨星大谷翔平让球迷猜测新婚妻子的身份--称她是 "一个普通的日本人"
item.description:
Japanese baseball superstar Shohei Ohtani keeps fans guessing on identity of new wife - says she is "a normal Japanese person"https://t.co/Bdn5ruFByx pic.twitter.com/9vCkioeO72

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频德克萨斯州是 200 年前的一个独立国家，现在有一部分人希望恢复这一地位，主张分离，他们称之为 Texit
item.description:
VIDEO Texas, an independent country 200 years ago, now boasts a pocket of people who want that status back, advocating a separation they call Texit pic.twitter.com/gzy2JITE4L

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 奥普拉-温弗瑞（Oprah Winfrey）宣布离开WeightWatchers公司董事会，导致该公司股价周四暴跌--这是WeightWatchers品牌陷入困境的最新迹象，因为它正努力与新的减肥药物竞争。
item.description:
Oprah Winfrey's announcement that she is leaving the board of WeightWatchers sent the company's shares tumbling Thursday -- the latest sign of trouble for the brand as it struggles to compete with new weight-loss drugshttps://t.co/Pwk9b7XesM pic.twitter.com/CKUIeDAw2Z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: #2019年新西兰火山灾难受害者获赔600万美元
item.description:
#BREAKING Victims of 2019 New Zealand volcano disaster awarded US$6m in damages pic.twitter.com/pCpK7ezBLk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周四，毕尔巴鄂竞技队凭借伊纳基和尼科-威廉姆斯兄弟在上半场的进球，以 3-0 的比分（总比分 4-0 ）战胜马德里竞技队，晋级国王杯决赛⚽ #AFPSports
item.description:
First half goals from brothers Inaki and Nico Williams sent Atletico Bilbao on their way to a 3-0 win -- 4-0 on aggregate -- over Atletico Madrid on Thursday and into the Copa del Rey final⚽ #AFPSports https://t.co/UUWNtMbntE pic.twitter.com/aPwejcVzlv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 美国南部阿拉巴马州最高法院裁定冷冻胚胎为儿童后，该州立法者周四通过立法，保护试管婴儿诊所的医务工作者免于承担法律责任。故事作者：@IssamAhmed⬇️
item.description:
Lawmakers in Alabama passed legislation Thursday to protect health workers at IVF clinics from legal liability after the southern US state's supreme court ruled frozen embryos are children. Story by @IssamAhmed⬇️https://t.co/1vEWrxWDPN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 梅西和国际米兰将在本周六的美国职业足球大联盟比赛中主场迎战佛罗里达州的对手奥兰多城队，他们将面临赛季初的德比考验。#AFPSports⚽

Lionel Messi and Inter Miami face an early season derby test when they host Florida rivals Orlando City in Major League Soccer on Saturday. #AFPSports⚽https://t.co/BiABhzGdta pic.twitter.com/x9DzzBTD2b

item.title: 周四，法庭听取了演员亚历克-鲍德温（Alec Baldwin）的证词，他在一名摄影师中枪身亡的电影拍摄现场挥舞着枪支，并将其 "用作指向杆"。
item.description:
Actor Alec Baldwin waved his gun around and used it "as a pointing stick" on the film set where a cinematographer was shot dead, a court heard Thursdayhttps://t.co/ytNrJV5nM1 pic.twitter.com/0vPrNtyAyY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国队在 CONCACAF 女子金杯赛上以 2-0 的比分负于墨西哥队，本周末四分之一决赛即将开始，美国队需要证明自己的实力 #AFPSports ⚽
item.description:
The United States' 2-0 defeat to Mexico at the CONCACAF Women's Gold Cup has left the Americans with everything to prove as the quarter-finals kick off this weekend #AFPSports ⚽https://t.co/YNKwPkyfdq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国总统拜登（Joe Biden）和前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四分别访问了美墨边境，就11月大选中最热门的问题之一展开了一场争夺选民的高风险战役。点击此处阅读全文⬇️
item.description:
President Joe Biden and former president Donald Trump paid rival visits to the US-Mexico border Thursday in a high-stakes battle for voters on one of the hottest issues in November's election.
Read the full story here⬇️https://t.co/5gnB7quDsd pic.twitter.com/GbmKUh6qpO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频🎥 东京市政府总部气势恢宏的塔楼现在是世界上最大的永久性投影地图显示屏的所在地，政府官员希望它能成为吸引游客的新景点。
item.description:
VIDEO🎥 The imposing towers of Tokyo's city government headquarters are now home to the world's largest permanent projection mapping display, which officials hope will become a new tourist draw pic.twitter.com/Vc3t34b3dn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 埃菲尔铁塔锈迹斑斑，维修进度严重滞后，成为巴黎市长和她的主要竞争对手法国文化部长之间权力斗争的焦点。@pierrick_yvon 和 @jurgenhecker⬇️ 报道
item.description:
The Eiffel Tower, attacked by rust and well behind on its maintenance schedule, has taken centre stage in a power struggle between the Paris mayor and her main rival, the French minister of culture. Story by @pierrick_yvon and @jurgenhecker⬇️https://t.co/Uz2LXpusJ5 pic.twitter.com/u0Wzl1L9bi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 阿维娃-西格尔（Aviva Siegel）在加沙作为哈马斯人质存活了 51 天，她的丈夫基思（Keith）也被关押在那里。如今重获自由，她仍抱着希望，希望他们能再次相见。点击这里阅读故事⬇️
item.description:
Aviva Siegel survived 51 days as a Hamas hostage in Gaza, held in captivity alongside her husband Keith. Now freed, she clings to the hope of them seeing each other again. Read the story here⬇️https://t.co/thDzzTdkzB pic.twitter.com/ejWLytotiS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 达尼尔-梅德韦杰夫（Daniil Medvedev）周四战胜亚历杭德罗-达维多维奇-福金娜（Alejandro Davidovich Fokina），闯入迪拜半决赛，延续了他今年的出色开局 #AFPSports
item.description:
Daniil Medvedev raced to victory over Alejandro Davidovich Fokina on Thursday to reach the Dubai semi-finals and continue his excellent start to the year #AFPSports https://t.co/QHLwmgNKnQ pic.twitter.com/g154eLBh9e

item.title: 本周四，刘易斯-汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）在本周末揭幕战巴林大奖赛的练习赛中出人意料地领先队友乔治-拉塞尔（George Russell），并警告他的梅赛德斯车队不要 "自不量力"。请点击此处阅读⬇️。
item.description:
Lewis Hamilton warned his Mercedes team not to "get ahead of ourselves" on Thursday after unexpectedly topping the times ahead of team-mate George Russell in practice for this weekend's season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix.
Read the story here⬇️https://t.co/HZZpNHjick pic.twitter.com/KQ3FbLvi4R

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 马库斯-拉什福德说他可以接受 "任何头条新闻"，但要求批评他的人在质疑他对曼联的承诺和对足球的热爱之前 "多一点人性" #AFPSports⚽
item.description:
Marcus Rashford says he can take "any headline" but asked his critics to show a "bit more humanity" before they question his commitment to Manchester United and love of football #AFPSports⚽https://t.co/sdPvAQeoCa pic.twitter.com/5cwcgAPxJx

item.title: 视频🎥伊拉克拥有巨大的石油财富，但北部许多艰难跋涉的农民说，原油泄漏污染了他们的土地，使他们在已经与干旱作斗争的情况下压力倍增。
item.description:

item.title: 以色列军队在饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带向争抢粮食援助的巴勒斯坦人开火，周四发生了一场混乱的混战，哈马斯统治的加沙地带卫生部称这场混战造成104人死亡。
item.description:
Israeli forces in war-torn Gaza opened fire on Palestinians scrambling for food aid in a chaotic melee on Thursday that the health ministry in the Hamas-run territory said killed 104 people.

The Israeli military said a "stampede" occurred when thousands of Gazans surrounded a… pic.twitter.com/mYWcGKhler

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024
